title: Acceptable Levels
brief_description: John Davies’ incisive drama on the responsibility of the media to those they film and photograph and the abuse of that responsibility in the pursuit of “acceptable” news and entertainment. A drama set in Northern Ireland.
description: John Davies’ incisive drama on the responsibility of the media to those they film and photograph and the abuse of that responsibility in the pursuit of “acceptable” news and entertainment. A drama set in Northern Ireland.
